format.h¶

Overview¶

Description:

Declares the media formats provided in the Format class.

1.0

Data Structures¶

Data Structure Name

Description

OHOS::Media::FormatData

Represents the data format.

OHOS::Media::Format

Saves and sets media metadata, such as the media playback duration.
